Module contents¶

multi_imbalance.datasets.load_datasets(data_home='./../../data/')¶

Load the benchmark datasets. Parameters ——- data_home : Default catalogue in which the data is stored in .tar.gz format.

datasetsOrderedDict of Bunch object,

The ordered is defined by filter_data. Each Bunch object — refered as dataset — have the following attributes:

dataset.data : ndarray, shape (n_samples, n_features)

dataset.target : ndarray, shape (n_samples, )

dataset.DESCRstring

Description of the each dataset.
